TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionSecurityTokenHandler extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler

summary.span: 處理型別為 之安全性權杖的 。

span.span: A that processes security tokens of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別序列化、 還原序列化，以及驗證工作階段權杖。The class serializes, deserializes, and validates session tokens. 工作階段權杖是型別的權杖。Session tokens are tokens of type . 類別序列化的權杖與 cookie 格式。The class serializes the tokens to and from cookie format. 根據預設，此類別序列化權杖 Ws-secure Conversation Feb2005 或 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3``項目。By default, the class serializes tokens into WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `` elements. 工作階段權杖由(WSFAM) 和(SAM) 來儲存資訊的工作階段中，這是主要與已驗證的使用者和工作階段開始和到期時間相關聯。Session tokens are used by the (WSFAM) and the (SAM) to store information about a session, this is primarily the associated with the authenticated user and the session start and expiration times. 在被動的情況下，會呼叫(SAM) 從驗證管線，以建立從工作階段權杖，代表已驗證的使用者。In passive scenarios, the calls into the (SAM) from the authentication pipeline to create a session token from the that represents the authenticated user. SAM 會使用其設定才能建立語彙基元，並將它序列化為 cookie （和還原序列化的權杖上的後續要求的 cookie）。The SAM uses its configured to create the token and to serialize it into a cookie (and to deserialize the token from a cookie on subsequent requests). SAM 會使用其設定的執行個體寫回至 HTTP 回應 cookie 的類別。The SAM uses an instance of its configured class to write the cookie back to the HTTP Response. 此 cookie 則傳回至用戶端，並在後續要求的 cookie，而不是反覆存取進行重新取得安全性權杖的身分識別提供者，可以呈現用戶端。This cookie is then returned to the client and on subsequent requests the client can present the cookie rather than making a round trip back to the identity provider to re-obtain a security token. 如需有關如何使用 WIF 工作階段的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WIF 工作階段管理](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md)。For more information about how sessions operate with WIF, see [WIF Session Management](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md). > [!NOTE] > \ 組態項目可用來指定可保護應用程式的工作階段的責任。The \ configuration element can be used to specify a that has the responsibility for securing the application’s sessions. 開發人員時應謹慎小心變更此設定，因為設定不正確的系統可能會導致應用程式遭到入侵。Developers should use caution when changing this configuration setting, as a misconfigured system could result in application compromise. 例如，指定 衍生的超連結"http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh193426%28v=vs.110%29.aspx"\t"_blank"和基底，傳遞空的 (CookieTransform) 的轉換集合時，會導致將序列化為未受保護的 cookie 的使用者身分識別。For example, specifying a derived HYPERLINK "http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh193426%28v=vs.110%29.aspx" \t "_blank" and passing an empty Transforms (CookieTransform) collection to the base, would result in the users identity being serialized into a cookie that was not protected. 這可能會允許攻擊者修改身分識別，並因此變更存取權限。This could allow an attacker to modify the identity and therefore change access privileges. 如果工作階段權杖是在參考模式中，也就是其屬性是`true`、 工作階段權杖處理常式只會序列化的工作階段權杖來重新產生其金鑰時所需的屬性。If the session token is in reference mode, that is, its property is `true`, the session token handler only serializes properties of the session token that are needed to regenerate its key in the . 在預設案例中，類別用來表示快取索引鍵，並寫入的權杖處理常式和語彙基元的屬性。In the default case, the class is used to represent cache keys, and the token handler writes the and properties of the token. 如果工作階段權杖是不是處於參考模式，也就是屬性是`false`，然後除了先前所述的屬性，處理常式會叫用方法語彙基元，並將序列化為位元組陣列cookie 也中產生的值。If the session token is not in reference mode, that is, the property is `false`, then, in addition to the properties mentioned previously, the handler invokes the method on a byte array serialized from the token and stores the resulting value in the cookie as well. 如需進一步瞭解如何序列化此語彙基元的詳細資訊，請參閱方法。For more details about how the token is serialized, see the method. 屬性會取得清單的轉換套用至工作階段權杖方法。The property gets the list of transforms that are applied to the session token in the method. 所有的轉換是衍生自類別。All transforms derive from the class. 在預設情況下而會套用。In the default case the and the are applied. 使用資料保護 API (DPAPI) 來保護 cookie 資料。The uses the Data Protection API (DPAPI) to protect the cookie material. DPAPI 會使用的電腦執行其保護演算法中的特定索引鍵。DPAPI uses a key that is specific to the computer on which it is running in its protection algorithms. 基於這個理由，預設工作階段權杖處理常式不是可在 Web 伺服陣列案例中使用，因為在此情況下，一部電腦上寫入的權杖可能需要在另一部電腦上讀取。For this reason, the default session token handler is not usable in Web farm scenarios because, in such scenarios, tokens written on one computer may need to be read on another computer. 若要避免這個問題，您可以使用許多策略。You can use many strategies to circumvent this issue. 例如，您可以：For example, you can: - 取代預設與。Replace the default with the . 可讓您指定簽署和加密金鑰，在 ASP.NET 之下``組態檔中的項目。The enables you to specify signing and encryption keys under the ASP.NET `` element in the configuration file. - 提供的處理常式global.asax.cs 檔案和取代預設的工作階段中的事件語彙基元處理常式的執行個體具有包含一份轉換而。Provide a handler for the event in the global.asax.cs file and replace the default session token handler with an instance of that has a list of transforms that includes the and the . 您可以藉由叫用的建構函式可接受的轉換清單的其中一個來建立新的執行個體。You can create the new instance by invoking one of the constructors that takes a list of transforms. - 衍生自訂的轉換，從基底類別，並使用上述的方法，把它納入要套用的轉換清單。Derive a custom transform from the base class and use the method above to include it in the list of transforms to be applied. - 衍生的自訂權杖處理常式從並實作您自己的機制。Derive a custom token handler from and implement your own mechanism. 如需在 Web 伺服陣列案例中使用工作階段的詳細資訊，請參閱[WIF 和 Web 伺服陣列](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md)。For more information about using sessions in Web farm scenarios, see [WIF and Web Farms](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md). 包含在預設語彙基元處理常式集合中; 不過，您可以自訂工作階段權杖處理常式來取代第一個指定[<移除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md)項目底下[ <securityTokenHandlers> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md)若要移除集合，然後再新增 您的自訂權杖處理常式使用的預設處理常式的項目[<新增>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md)項目。The is included in the default token handler collection; however, you can replace it with a custom session token handler by first specifying a [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove.md) element under the [<securityTokenHandlers>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers.md) element to remove the default handler from the collection and then adding your custom token handler using the [<add>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add.md) element. 根據預設，您可以指定預設權杖存留期包括[ <sessionTokenRequirement> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md)項目底下``項目。By default, you can specify the default token lifetime by including the [<sessionTokenRequirement>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/sessiontokenrequirement.md) element under the `` element. 您可以設計自訂的權杖處理常式來採取自訂組態項目底下``藉由覆寫的項目方法，以提供邏輯以處理它們。You can design a custom token handler to take custom configuration elements under the `` element by overriding the method to provide the logic to process them. ## Examples 下列 XML 會說明如何以取代預設工作階段安全性權杖處理常式的權杖處理常式集合中的執行個體組態中的類別。The following XML shows how to replace the default session security token handler in a token handler collection with an instance of the class in configuration. ```xml ```

span.span: <sessionTokenRequirement>

WIF Session Management

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken ReadToken(unsigned int8[] token, class System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver tokenResolver) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ReadToken (token As Byte(), tokenResolver As SecurityTokenResolver) As SecurityToken

param.name: token
param.span: 包含權杖的位元組資料流。

span.span: The stream of bytes that contains the token.

param.name: tokenResolver

summary.span: 設定會套用至 Cookie 的轉換。

span.span: Sets the transforms that will be applied to cookies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定轉換所傳回的清單屬性。Sets the list of transforms returned by the property. 轉換將會以其出現在清單中，編碼 cookie 時，並以反向順序解碼 cookie 時的順序套用。Transforms will be applied in the order in which they appear in the list when encoding a cookie and in the reverse order when decoding a cookie. > [!WARNING] > 如果`transforms`參數是`null`，將會擲回例外狀況，從方法呼叫來編碼或解碼 cookie 時。If the `transforms` parameter is `null`, an exception will be thrown from the method when it is called to encode or decode the cookie.

span.span: Validates the specified session token and returns its claims.

returns.span: 包含在語彙基元中的識別。

span.span: The identities that are contained in the token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行檢查，以確定指定的語彙基元的範圍設定為指定的端點識別碼，而且，如果是的話，會叫用方法; 否則會擲回。Performs a check to make sure that the specified token is scoped for the specified endpoint ID and, if so, invokes the method; otherwise, throws a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 有的工作階段權杖屬於屬性`null`或全域範圍的範圍會被視為空白。Session tokens that have an property that is `null` or empty are considered to be globally scoped. 這代表潛在的安全性風險。This presents a potential security risk. 因此您應該確定屬性會設定您的工作階段權杖。For this reason you should make sure that the property is set in your session tokens.

summary.span: 使用指定的 XML 寫入器，序列化指定的語彙基元。

span.span: Serializes the specified token by using the specified XML writer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作會將指定的權杖序列化為 Ws-secure Conversation Feb2005 或 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3``項目，根據的值屬性。The default implementation serializes the specified token as either a WS-Secure Conversation Feb2005 or WS-Secure Conversation 1.3 `` element, depending on the value of the property. 屬性會序列化為`Id`屬性。The property is serialized as the `Id` attribute. 屬性會序列化為``子項目。The property is serialized as the `` child element. 如果沒有`null`屬性會序列化為``項目。If not `null` the property is serialized as an `` element. 最後，如果屬性是`false`，將整個語彙基元序列化成二進位陣列傳遞至要編碼的方法。Finally, if the property is `false`, the entire token is serialized into binary array which is passed to the method to be encoded. 已編碼語彙基元接著會寫入為 base64 編碼值的項目和所指定的命名空間和屬性。The encoded token is then written as a base64 encoded value to the element and namespace specified by the and properties. 如果屬性是`true`，則不會序列化此語彙基元。If the property is `true`, the token is not serialized.
